translated: seated in the center of the light of space,🔽terrifying hundreds of thousands of Brahma and others,🔽terrifying all the hosts of bhutas without exception,🔽the afflictions, the secondary afflictions,🔽the nagas, yakshas, rakshasas, pretas, and so forth,

translated: I go for refuge to you, the wrathful king.🔽Seated upon a lotus, sun, and moon seat,

original: ]phyag g.yas ral gri 'phyar bas ma rungs 'dul/_/rnam rtog 'joms shing rab tu grims pa'i sku/_/sku mdog mthing nag char sprin nag po 'dra/_/dbu skra ardza ka yi 'bras bu 'dra/_/sku ni shing mchog yongs 'du sa brtol 'dra/_/zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum gyad kyis khros khros 'dra/_/lha
analyzed: ]phyag g.yas ral gri 'phyar bas ma rungs 'dul/_/rnam rtog 'joms shing rab tu grims pa'i sku/_/sku mdog mthing nag char sprin nag po 'dra/_/dbu skra ardza ka yi 'bras bu 'dra/_/sku ni shing mchog yongs 'du sa brtol 'dra/_/zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum gyad kyis khros khros 'dra/_/lha
translated: His body is like the best of trees, the coral tree,🔽His two legs are extended and contracted like a wrathful champion.🔽I take refuge in you, O supreme deity,🔽Your eyes are like the flesh-colored flowers of the palasha tree,🔽Your fangs are like the full moon,🔽Your flickering tongue is like lightning in the sky,

analyzed: ]mchog khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/_/spyan mig pa la sha yi me tog 'dra/_/mche ba gtshigs pa zla ba tshhes pa 'dra/_/ljags 'gyur ba ni nam mkha'i glog dang 'dra/_/smin ma'i khro gnyer brig sha'i lo ma 'dra/_/ral gri zla tshhes mtshhor lhung 'od dang 'dra/_/sbrul gyi zhags pa
translated: Your frowning eyebrows are like the leaves of the bhringa plant,🔽Your sword is like the light of the full moon falling,🔽Your snake lasso

translated: You liberate from untimely death🔽And all negative actions.🔽In the center and four directions are the five families of Acala,🔽In the four intermediate directions are the four wrathful ones,🔽And in the corners and intermediate directions are the eight goddesses.🔽Homage to Bhagavan Acala.

translated: The ten wrathful emanations from your body,🔽Vajravega

analyzed: ]sku mdog mthing nag ste/_/nga dang ngar 'dzin gnam lcags 'khor lo bsnams/_/bgegs tshhogs skrag par mdzad la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/sprul pa'i khro rgyal rdo rje chags chen ni/_/gdul bya'i don du sku mdog dmar po ste/_/chags dang chags pa'i don du mda' gzhu bsnams/_/ma rungs
translated: and holds a bow and arrow for the sake of passion and the object of passion,🔽subduing the unruly.🔽The emanated wrathful one, Vajra Sharpness,🔽is green in color for the sake of those to be tamed,🔽and holds a hook for the sake of grasping and the nature of grasping,🔽leading transmigrating beings.

translated: The emanated wrathful one, Vajra Blazing,
is the color of a snow mountain at sunrise,

translated: I pay homage to you, Vajra Wrathful One, who is dark green in color,🔽whose nature is equanimity and change,🔽whose hand emblem is a noose of clouds,🔽you who guide beings.🔽I pay homage to you, emanated wrathful one, Vajra Skillful Means,🔽who is yellow-black in color, like the color of smoke,

translated: holding a medicine wheel of meteoric iron,🔽dispelling afflictions, I pay homage to you.🔽Vajrahetu is red-black,🔽the nature of dependent origination,🔽holding a club in his hand to subdue the unruly,🔽I pay homage to the one who terrifies the māras.
